mapper.select: select * from chat_room where room_owner = (select gonggu_writer from gonggu WHERE gonggu_no = (select gonggu_no from parti_tb where parti_member = #{userId})) or room_owner = #{userId} order by last_chat desc
mapper.insert: insert into chat_room values ( chatroom_seq.nextval, #{gongguNo}, #{gongguWriter}, default, SYSDATE )
